Title: Roadkill: A Love Story
Writer: Kelly Buechel (story), Raphael Maria Buechel (idea), Brandon Culp (screenplay)
Actors: Erika Hoveland, Brandon Culp, Cain Perry, My-Ishia Cason-Brown
Plot: The heart of small-town America. A young mute works his days lazily away at a car wash. His brother, the town sheriff, longs for action but instead drowns himself in the bottle. A ...
